## UIPortal.attachObjectToAllPortals() method

使该物体对所有传送门可见/不可见

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static attachObjectToAllPortals( object : UIObject, visible : boolean, recursive : boolean) : void ;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  object | [UIObject](./extractor.uiobject.md) | 物体 |
|  visible | boolean | 是否对传送门可见 |
|  recursive | boolean | 是否对该物体的所有子物体递归调用 |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
